page.title: 15Leisure Time in Hunton
page.content: In our village, What have we got? Starting the week, Church on Sundays, Or Chapel for some. Then come Fun Days Toddlers going with their mothers For a get_together with the others. On Youth Club night _ Tennis and Pool It's their relaxation after school. Ladies Keep Fit or join W.I. They also enjoy a sing in the choir. Weekly Whist seems to thrive Or better still, a Domino Drive. Quoits for the men with other clubs Then some supper in one of the pubs. Competing on Open Day for the Trophy Women providing the afternoon tea. In July the village goes gay, Highlight of the year,it's Sports Day, Fancy Dress,Races,Raffle,Tombola stall A Disco at night to entertain all. Six days a week we call at the shop For bags of crisps or a bottle of pop I can tell you _ WE'VE GOT THE LOT!
